name: tower-defense
description: 2-player networked tower defense game with ASCII art style

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:server && npm run build:client && cp client/index.html dist/client/ && cp client/styles.css dist/client/
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.tunnel: npm run build && concurrently "npm start" "npx localtunnel --port 8080"
